company.name: Amanotes
company.tagline: The #1 music games publisher in the world. The #1 mobile apps publisher from SEA with 1B+ downloads.
company.description:
We are Amanotes! A fast-growing startup in the music-tech industry with global outreach. We seek to delight people with interactive music experiences.

Since 2014, 30+ music games and mobile applications were published under our name with 1+ billion downloads worldwide and 95+ million monthly active users. In 2019, we were proudly listed as the #1 mobile apps publisher from Southeast Asia, the #1 music games publisher in the world, and one of the top 20 mobile apps publishers in the world across all categories.

If you love to work in a friendly and fun environment with music all around the corner, come join us!

Explore our products on Google Play and iOS App Store such as Magic Tiles 3, Tiles Hop, Dancing Ballz, and more than 30 others.
